description:
AÂ MapÂ is constructed by passing a URL to a web map stored in ArcGIS Online. A connection is made to theÂ mouseClickedÂ signal of theÂ MapView, and when this signal emits,Â selectFeaturesÂ is executed on theÂ FeatureLayer. Once this completes, aÂ FeatureQueryResultÂ is returned, giving access to theÂ FeatureIterator. ThisÂ FeatureIteratorÂ contains all of theÂ FeatureÂ objects selected with the mouse click. TheseÂ FeatureÂ objects are iterated over, and for each object, theÂ queryRelatedFeaturesÂ method is called. Once this completes, the returnedÂ RelatedFeatureQueryResultÂ gives access to all of the related features, and the UI is populated with this information.

title: Listed Related Features
